import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { getAll } from "../BooksAPI"; function Shelf() { const [books, setBooks] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { getAll() .then((data) => { setBooks(data); }) .catch((error) => { console.log(error); // Xử lý lỗi khi fetch gặp vấn đề }); }, []); function onMoveShelf(book, newShelf) { if (book.shelf !== newShelf) { books.map((item) => { if (item.id === book.id) { return { ...item, shelf: newShelf }; } return item; }); } setBooks(books); } return (

MyReads

Currently Reading

    {books && books.map( (book) => book.shelf === "currentlyReading" && (
  1. {book.subtitle}
    {book.authors.join(", ")}
    2. ) )}

Want to Read

    {books && books.map( (book) => book.shelf === "wantToRead" && (
  1. {book.subtitle}
    {book.authors.join(", ")}
    2. ) )}

Read

    {books && books.map( (book) => book.shelf === "read" && (
  1. {book.subtitle}
    {book.authors.join(", ")}
    2. ) )}
Add a book
); } export default Shelf;
